Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
How can i change my account password ?

To change your account password on NewsBreak, you'll need to log in to your account first. Once logged in, go to the 'Me' tab and select 'Edit Profile.' From there, you should see an option to change your password. If you encounter any issues, feel free to reach out for further assistance!
can you give me a URL

Sure! You can visit the NewsBreak Help Center for more information on managing your account here: [NewsBreak Help Center](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/sections/4417483968269-Profile-and-Info). Let me know if you need anything else!
i can not see ME tab

If you're having trouble finding the 'Me' tab, make sure you're using the NewsBreak app. The 'Me' tab is typically located at the bottom of the app screen. If it's still not visible, try updating your app to the latest version or reinstalling it. If you continue to have issues, please let me know!

Ah, got it! In the Ads Manager, you can change your password by going to the account settings. Look for an option like 'Account' or 'Profile Settings,' where you should find the option to update your password. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
Thanks for contacting us and we want to hear from you!
